name: Dog Simulator HD
description:
The most beautiful and realistic Dog Simulator available on App Store! Play as a real dog inside a cool apartment and get ready for some real adventures. Knock off stuff, destroy whatever you like and cause the massive damage.

Run around, knock things over and make a mess with this cute little puppy dog. Every item you know over scores you points. See if you can get a high score!

- Stunning high quality 3D graphics
- Smooth and optimized performance
- Easy controls
- Multiple game modes
- Cool apartment to explore
- Cool warehouse to explore
- Ability to customize your dog (FOR FREE!)
- Hundreds of items to play with

Good luck and have fun!

MORE COMING SOON
